text:
http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-5.5-doc/setup.html

<a name="Unix daemon">

Please do not use spaces within anchors -- it makes it hard for tools which
create links automatically (e.g. email clients) to create a satisfactory link.

Let's see if bugzilla can do it:

http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-5.5-doc/setup.html#Unix daemon

creator: sdavids@gmx.de
text:
Yes, one could use:

http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-5.5-doc/setup.html#Unix%20daemon

but it is a little less convenient.

If you care enough to do this right, please submit patches against doc files
that have spaced anchors in them.  That way we can apply your patches quickly. 
Otherwise, as you noted, this may be inconvenient but it's legal and works with
every browser I've tested...
